radiographic_examinations.findings: Abnormal signal changes in the brain stem; early ischemic changes involving basis pontis bilaterally; small areas of restricted diffusion in left thalamus and left midbrain.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Some regression of the lesion of the basis pontis, mostly on its ventral aspect, with no new areas of infarcts.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Occlusive thrombus extending from the midportion to the distal portion of the basilar artery.
